author: ebouvier
body: These additions corresponds to the HLT DQM Offline code for Top PAG, which has been tested on RelVal TTbar. The "white Rabbit" seems to indicate that they are not breaking anything. The documentation can be found at https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/HLTDQMOfflineTopPAG
title: HLT DQM Offline for Top PAG
